description: Creative Enzymes is an innovator in enzyme products and services. We are specialized in development of technical routes to commercialization, including key steps in enzyme production and supplies. As an important stabilization method, we use organic solvents in enzyme formulations to maximize enzyme stability of desired products. The extensive experience in enzyme stabilization makes Creative Enzymes the best-known supplier of stabilization services.
name: Stabilization in Organic Solvents
